test.query: SELECT largestTriangleThreeBuckets(10)(EventTime, ResolutionWidth) FROM hits WHERE CounterID < 1000 GROUP BY CounterID ORDER BY count() DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT largestTriangleThreeBuckets(100)(EventTime, ResolutionWidth) FROM hits WHERE CounterID < 1000 GROUP BY CounterID ORDER BY count() DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT largestTriangleThreeBuckets(1000)(EventTime, ResolutionWidth) FROM hits WHERE CounterID < 1000 GROUP BY CounterID ORDER BY count() DESC LIMIT 10
